attributes.action: Two minutes silence for Drummer Lee Rigby and all his fallen comrades and a state funeral for Drummer Rigby
attributes.additional_details: I urge the Government to demonstrate respect and support for our troops and for the nation by arranging a national two minutes silence for Drummer Lee Rigby and all his fallen comrades and a state funeral for Drummer Rigby. It is long overdue that our nation demonstrated some backbone and some respect.
